author: lgawron
msg: although "onsubmit called twice" we do not need "forms_onSubmitHandlers has no properties" error.

author: lgawron
msg: XMLHttpRequest.send seems to choke if request uri is empty.
Lots of users use <ft:form action=""/> and pass continuation id in a hidden field.
This fix uses document.location if specified form.action is empty.
